mapper.sql: topic_id, topic_name, topic_title, is_levelup, pass_name, pass_text, topic_status, create_time, update_time, create_sys_user_id, update_sys_user_id, topic_icon, answer_right_text, answer_wrong_text, is_draw, draw_rule, share_logo_img, share_title, share_describe, index_logo, template_id
mapper.select:
select
from ccp_contest_topic where topic_status=1 ORDER BY update_time DESC

select t.topic_id, t.topic_name, t.topic_title, t.is_levelup, t.pass_name, t.pass_text, t.topic_status, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.create_sys_user_id, t.update_sys_user_id, t.topic_icon, t.answer_right_text, t.answer_wrong_text, t.is_draw, t.draw_rule, t.share_logo_img, t.share_title, t.share_describe,t.index_logo, t.template_id,template.template_id,template.template_name,template.cover_img_url,template.background_img_url, template.template_is_system from ccp_contest_topic t left join ccp_contest_template template on t.template_id= template.template_id where topic_status!=0 and topic_id=#{topicId}
mapper.insert: insert into ccp_contest_topic (topic_id, topic_name, topic_title, is_levelup, pass_name, pass_text, topic_status, create_time, update_time, create_sys_user_id, update_sys_user_id, topic_icon, answer_right_text, answer_wrong_text, is_draw, draw_rule, share_logo_img, share_title, share_describe, index_logo, template_id ) values (#{topicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLevelup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createSysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateSysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerRightText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerWrongText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDraw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareLogoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update ccp_contest_topic
topic_name = #{topicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topic_title = #{topicTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_levelup = #{isLevelup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pass_name = #{passName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_text = #{passText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topic_status = #{topicStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_sys_user_id = #{createSysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_sys_user_id = #{updateSysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topic_icon = #{topicIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer_right_text = #{answerRightText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer_wrong_text = #{answerWrongText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

index_logo = #{indexLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
